Creepy Peep - Bundle Pack - Monster Green
kDesc

Creepy Peep is a playful little monster who wants to be your friend! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control you Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
 This set includes the following items.


・Creepy Peep - Monster Green
 ・Creepy Peep - Static Mini - Monster Green
 ・Creepy Peep - Heavy Pet - Monster Green


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Creepy Peep est un petit monstre joueur qui veut être ton ami! C'est trois en un avec Peep fun supplémentaire! Ramène ton Peep a ton appartement et que la fête commence. Tu peux contrôler ton Peep avec des animations et manœuvres personnalisées. Prends le à l'extérieur de ton appartement comme compagnon ou expose le à ton appartement dans sa boite Peep-a-Boo. Rassemble les tous et entasse les pour que tous puissent les voir![#Legal]

Creepy Peep ist ein verspieltes kleines Monster, das dein Freund sein will! Er kommt im Dreier-Pack mit extra Peep-Spaß! Bring dein Heavy Pet Peep in deine Wohnung und der Spaß beginnt. Du kannst dein Peep mit benutzerdefinierten Animationen und Bewegungen steuern. Nimm ihn als Gefährten mit nach draußen oder stelle ihn in deiner Wohnung in seiner Peep-a-Boo Kiste aus. Sammle sie alle und stelle sie für Alle zur Schau aus![#Legal]

Creepy Peep é un mostro giocherellone che vuol diventare il tuo amico! Tre per uno divertimento extra Peep! Porta il tuo Peep nel tuo appartamento e che il divertimento abbia inizio. Puoi controllare il tuo Peep con animazioni e movimenti fatti a posta. Portalo fuori dal tuo appartamento come Companion o ppure mettilo on mostra nel tuo appartamento nella sua scatola Peep-a-Boo. Colleziona tutti quanti e mettili in mostra perché tutti possano vederli![#Legal]

Creepy Peep es un monstruo juguetón que quiere ser tu cuate! Mas diversión Peep al tres por uno! Lleva a tu Peep a tu departamento y que empieze la diversión. Puedes controlar a tu Peep con animaciones y movimientos personalizados. Sácalo de tu departamento como Companion o pónlo de muestra en tu departamento en su propia caja Peep-a-Boo. Colecciónalos todos y amontónalos para que los vea todo el mundo![#Legal]
*Not Localised* Home_Object_48 [#Legal]

Creepy Peep은 장난끼 많은 작은 몬스터 친구입니다! 추가 Peep으로 세 가지 즐거움을 누려보세요! Peep을 아파트로 데려와 신나게 놀아 보세요. 사용자 지정 애니메이션과 모션으로 Peep을 컨트롤할 수 있습니다! 친구처럼 아파트 밖에 데려가거나 Peep-A-Boo 박스에 디스플레이된 Mini-Peep을 아파트에 데려다 놓아보세요. Mini-Peep을 모두 모아 친구들에게 자랑해 보세요!
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●Creepy Peep - 괴물 초록
 ●Creepy Peep - Static Mini - 괴물 초록
 ●Creepy Peep - Heavy Pet - 괴물 초록


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다.[#Legal]

Creepy Peep is a playful little monster who wants to be your friend! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control you Peep with custom animations and moves. Take him outside of your apartment as a Companion or place him on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
 This set includes the following items.


・Creepy Peep - Monster Green
 ・Creepy Peep - Static Mini - Monster Green
 ・Creepy Peep - Heavy Pet - Monster Green


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Creepy Peep是調皮的小怪物，他想要成為您的朋友！給您特別的Peep樂趣！帶Peep進入您家，開始玩樂。您可以用自訂動態和動作來控制Peep。他可以作為隨身夥伴和您一起外出，或者您可以將他放進專用Peep-A-Boo盒子，成為家居擺設。集齊全套，向朋友炫耀一下吧！
 本組合包含以下商品。


●Creepy Peep - 怪獸綠
 ●Creepy Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 怪獸綠
 ●Creepy Peep - Heavy Pet - 怪獸綠


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
